Laporkan Ade Armando, Polisi Panggil Fahira Idris Besok
07 Nov 2019, 12:07 by M Julnis Firmansyah, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Polda Metro Jaya akan memanggil Anggota DPD RI Fahira Idris terkait laporannya terhadap dosen Universitas Indonesia Ade Armando pada Jumat besok, 8 November 2019. Fahira melaporkan Ade atas dugaan penghinaan terhadap Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan.
"Besok akan kami klarifikasi pelapornya, akan kami tanyakan seperti apa yang dilaporkannya, kemudian barang buktinya apa yang dibawa, kami tunggu saja besok," ujar Kepala Bidang Humas Polda Metro Jaya Komisaris Besar Argo Yuwono di kantornya, Jakarta Selatan, Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Hari ini Fahira rencananya akan bertemu dengan penyidik untuk memberikan keterangan soal pelaporan. Namun hingga sore sosok Fahira tak tampak. Sebelumnya, ia juga berencana bertemu Kepala Polda Metro Jaya Inspektur Jenderal Gatot Eddy Pramono untuk meminta atensi khusus terhadap kasus ini.
Fahira melaporkan Ade karena mengunggah foto Anies Baswedan dengan riasan wajah ala Joker di media sosial miliknya. Dia menuding hal itu sebagai penghinaan terhadap Gubernur DKI Jakarta tersebut.
Ade sendiri mengaku telah mengunggah meme tersebut. Ade mengatakan bahwa unggahan itu merupakan bentuk kecaman terhadap Anies setelah mencuatnya sejumlah anggaran janggal dalam rancangan APBD DKI 2020.
Tapi, menurut Ade, foto wajah Anies dengan makeup ala tokoh fiksi dalam DC Comics itu bukan buatan dirinya. Ade justru mempertanyakan dasar Fahira melaporkan dirinya. Menurut dia, laporan soal unggahan itu seharusnya dilakukan oleh Anies Baswedan. Dia pun sempat menyatakan berencana untuk melaporkan balik Fahira Idris ke polisi.
text:
Report Ade Armando, Police Call Fahira Idris Tomorrow
Nov 7 2019, 12:07 by M Julnis Firmansyah, Febriyan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jakarta Metropolitan Police will summon DPD RI member Fahira Idris regarding his report to the University of Indonesia lecturer Ade Armando on Friday, November 8, 2019. Fahira reports Ade for alleged insult to DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan.
"Tomorrow we will clarify the reporter, we will ask as to what was reported, then what evidence is taken, we will wait tomorrow," said Head of Public Relations of the Jakarta Police, Commissioner Argo Yuwono at his office, South Jakarta, Thursday, November 7, 2019 .
Today Fahira plans to meet with investigators to provide information about reporting. But until the evening Fahira's figure was invisible. Previously, he also planned to meet Metro Jaya Police Chief Inspector General Gatot Eddy Pramono to ask for special attention on this case.
Fahira reports Ade for uploading a photo of Anies Baswedan with Joker-style makeup on his social media. He blamed it as an insult to the Governor of DKI Jakarta.
Ade himself claimed to have uploaded the meme. Ade said that the upload was a form of condemnation of Anies after the emergence of a number of odd budgets in the 2020 DKI Regional Budget.
But, according to Ade, the photo of Anies's face in the makeup style of a fictional character in DC Comics was not made by her. Ade actually questioned the basis of Fahira to report himself. According to him, the report about the upload was supposed to be done by Anies Baswedan. He also had stated that he planned to report back Fahira Idris to the police.
